Title: The Betrayal
Plot: Jerry, George and Elaine return from their trip to India that they don't want to talk about. Sue Ellen calls the wedding off and Nina doesn't want George or Jerry. George finds out that Jerry slept with Nina and Elaine slept with the groom. Kramer and FDR settle their score, a snowball with something extra. Jerry "schnapps" Elaine to find out why George is so bitter with him. Kramer tries to out wish FDR. Elaine, Jerry, George and Nina arrive in India, where Elaine discovers that the groom is so
GuestStars: Wayne Knight, Heidi Swedberg, Brenda Strong, Michael McShane, Justine Miceli, Bart Braverman, Shaun Toub, Noor Shic, Jocelyne Kelly, Brian Kaiser, Shelley Malil, Bill Lee Brown
